name: A Hole Lot of Death
description:
A Hole Lot of Death Death is Good - Unicorns are Bad

Your little rippers need your help. Those filthy colorful unicorns are after them and will devour them at first chance! Move close to them, grab them with your hook and throw them in death's hole for all eternity...

Be careful though, even when hooked, they will still grab any little rippers they can reach on the way to their demise!
